title: NYPD Officer's Funeral Binds Diversity In Culture And Opinion
teaser: NYPD Officer Wenjian Liu is being laid to rest Sunday. Liu and his partner were killed last month. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with WNYC's Stephen Nessen from the scene about what mourners are saying.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
